title: 2 Bed 2 Bath Aubrey TX Century 380 Luxury Apartment
posting_body: We now book our tour appointments online!
Please call or text us at
Book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!
Live the Century 380 Life and enjoy the best of big-city culture with the upscale comfort and privacy of a secluded members-only community.
Whether you are a young professional or a part of a thriving family, our apartments in Little Elm, Texas are the perfect fit for your lifestyle.
Century 380 is situated in a city on the rise and is comfortably nestled in the heart of the Metroplex, giving you unlimited access to downtown Dallas and Fort Worth.

Our proximity to local hot-spots including Lake Lewisville, Stonebriar Centre shopping hub, Grandscape’s hiking and biking trails, and the Dallas Cowboys’ World Headquarters ensure that you can live life with your finger on the pulse.
With a thriving arts scene, vibrant nightlife, and all the enterprise of the corporate world just minutes from home, your opportunities are endless.
Come home to sophisticated style and meticulous attention to detail when you live in one of our perfectly appointed one, two, and three bedroom apartment homes.
Visit us or apply online now to begin making Century 380 your new home.
Our community is also pet-friendly and offers convenient waste stations, a dog park, and our luxury pet spa.

Pet Fee (Non-Refundable): $350.00 (one pet);Additional $150.00 (two pets)Pet Deposit: $200.00 per petPet Screening: $20.00 (One pet); $35.00 (Two pets)Pet Rent: $20.00 (per pet monthly)Must pass pet screening; Non-Aggressive Breeds;2 Pet Max; No Weight Limit.
